resultPage.completeOperationMsg: If the device asks to you, give permission to complete the operation.

iframeCardPage.helpLink: Where do I find the CVV?
iframeCardPage.modalTitle: Where do I find the CVV?
iframeCardPage.modalBodyText:
The CVV code (or CVC) has 3 digits and is located on the back of your card.
On American Express cards, the code (CID) has 4 digits and is located on the front.

formErrors.name: Enter name as shown on the card

inputCardPage.helpLink: Where can I find the security code?

modal.description: It is a three-digit code, called CVV or CVS, which you can find on the back of your card.
modal.descriptionAE: On American Express cards, the code (CID) has four digits and is located on the front.
modal.title: Security code

inputCardPage.title: Enter card information

paymentNoticePage.description: Enter the data as show on the payment notice.
paymentNoticePage.exampleModalAltText: pagoPA payment notice, with the hightlighted section showing the notice code and the tax code of the creditor entity.
paymentNoticePage.title: What do you have to pay?
